name: Lost In The Maze (DevDudeDD)
description:
A prototype made for PROCJAM 2020

In this game you are stuck in procedural generated mazes. Explore each maze before the time runs out. Also take care of the enemies and try to not be eaten by them.

Hope you have some fun! Thanks for playing :)

Note: The game is not really performance optimzed yet. So i recommend to play the downloaded version, which should run smoother especially on older PCs.

CREDITS

Some animations in this game were downloaded from the Unity Assetstore. You can check out these packages here:

Basic Motions Free Pack by Kevin Iglesias

RPG Character Mecanim Animations by Explosive

Anime Girl Animations by Clean Curve Studio

Thanks a lot to the authors for sharing these packages!
